In order to make sure that you have a complatible JDK installed and configured, we need to perform a check on this Eclipse installation to make sure that
  • 1) There is a JDK8 VM available
  • 2) that it is set as the default. "Click perform" to check. IF there is an error message, then you must go to the Prefernces > Java > Installed JREs and add a JRE entry that points to a JDK8 installation and set it as the default.
